2095830.name: Crisis of DreamCell
2095830.description:
Crisis of DreamCell is a survival horror game that challenges you to solve puzzles, manage supplies, and escape a nightmarish world.

After an outbreak of experimental creatures, the bio-organic research facility of DreamCell is now on lockdown with the deadly experiments attempting to escape. Take on the role of the head scientist as he tries to escape in this cinematic third-person survival horror game. Equipped with a prototype suit and a newly developed gun that can take on these foes. Solve puzzles, keep an eye on your supplies, and watch for dangers around every corner to try and make it out alive.

Survival Horror Gameplay


Face horrific experiments with a prototype weapon where you can change ammo types depending on your situation. Manage limited ammo and healing supplies around you as you try to survive DreamCell's most dangerous experiments.

Challenging Puzzles


Find clues within notes and discover items left behind in the world to solve puzzles ranging from simple to complex, that will aid you in moving forward and discovering more about the dark secrets DreamCell aims to keep hidden.

Immersive Environments


Explore the many floors of DreamCell as you discover the remnants of the test subjects and scientists. Find notes and clues left behind from dark offices to the horrid test chambers discovering the story behind the incident. Traverse around the world fighting for your freedom from this nightmare.
2095830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
